additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sunflower Oil [contains Antioxidant (320)], Vinegar, Sugar, Lemon Juice, Salt, Garlic, Red Capsicum, Herbs, Vegetable Gums (Pectin, Xanthan Gum, Locust Bean Gum, Carrageenan), Citric Acid, Natural Flavour, Natural Colour (Annatto), Dextrose.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present MILK, May Be Present EGG

description: Coles Italian Dressing 300 MLX a great addition to your favourite salad that will really enhance the flavour
name: Italian Dressing
